text: Kill vehicle is a term from space weapon development and science fiction which denotes either a kinetic projectile or an explosive warhead supposed to impact on or (in the case of the warhead) near a target. It is the final missile stage of an interceptor weapon. ==See also== *Anti-satellite weapon *Exoatmospheric Kill Vehicle *Ground-Based Midcourse Defense *Kinetic kill vehicle *Multiple Kill Vehicle Category:Space weapons
title: Kill vehicle
